text: Definitely need good timing for the metro - dodge peak hours if you can! Saved me more than once from sardine-can situations.

Let's admit it—adult milestones are more like moving goalposts than actual finish lines! Whoever decided at which point you “should” have things sorted didn’t account for life’s curveballs.ührungssystem
Grappling with finances never really stops does it? Even library budgets are wild – talk about page-turners filled with unforeseen plot twists!
Solo night shifts? Been there – it’s not all bad though! Gives me peace to sort thoughts & dig into books undisturbed. Different strokes!
Is anywhere really sacred from work anymore?
Berets aside, bias sneaks into every field. Seen it firsthand - even libraries aren’t isolated from outdated norms influencing career paths.
Meritocracy's just myth; promotions still echo old-world chap favoritism.
Even in libraries we're boxed into old-timey archetypes - as if sorting books all day isn't challenging enough!
